channel.title: Irene Mathyssen

item.description: Encouraging people to support #LdnOnt Stephanie Simmons efforts to have a stamp for Childhood Cancer Awareness: http://t.co/cWiIiEu0W2

item.title: Posted on Twitter

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Happy #LabourDay to everyone back in Canada & especially those at #LdnOnt picnic hosted by the London District Labour Council. #thankaunion

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Getting ready #LabourDay weekend? Don't forget to thank a union! Safe work places, decent wages, & time off is all due to #labour movement.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: On my way to South Africa, it is a privilege to be among MPs representing Canada at Commonwealth Parliamentary Conference. #NDP #cdnpoli
